sorcer.provider.boot

Class SorcerDescriptorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.provider.boot.SorcerDescriptorUtil

  • public class SorcerDescriptorUtil
extends Object
    Holds static attributes used during the startup of services and provides utilities to obtain ServiceDescriptor instances for SORCER services

    • Method Detail

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy,
                           int port)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use The roots webster should serve
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using an anonymous port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/common/sorcer/webster.com
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not set

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy)
                                    throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy,
                           String[] roots)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using an anonymous port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/common/sorcer/webster.com
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not set

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy,
                           int port,
                           String[] roots)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        port - The port webster should use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using a specified port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/common/sorcer
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not set

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy,
                           int port,
                           String[] roots,
                           String address,
                           boolean debug)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        port - The port webster should use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        debug - If true, set the sorcer.tools.debug property
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using a specified port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from ${sorcer.home}/common/sorcer
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port

      • getWebster

        public static ServiceDescriptor getWebster(String policy,
                           int port,
                           String[] roots,
                           String address,
                           int startPort,
                           int endPort,
                           boolean debug,
                           boolean isDaemon)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        port - The port webster should use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        debug - If true, set the sorcer.tools.debug property
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using a specified port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from ${sorcer.home}/common/sorcer
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port

      • getSpacer

        public static ServiceDescriptor getSpacer(String policy,
                          String spacerConfig)
                                   throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Spacer using the Webster port created by this utility.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        spacerConfig - The configuration file the Spacer will use
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for the Spacer using an anonymous port. The jobberConfig file will be loaded from sorcer.home/lib
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not set

      • getExerter

        public static ServiceDescriptor getExerter(String policy,
                           String hostAddress,
                           int port,
                           String... exerterConfig)
                                    throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for ServiceTasker with beaned ExertProcessor, called Exerter.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        hostAddress - The address to use when constructing the codebase
        port - The port to use when constructing the codebase
        exerterConfig - The configuration options the ExertProcessor provider will use
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for the Exerter using an anonymous port. The sorcer-prv.jar file will be loaded from iGrid.home/lib/sorcer/lib
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the iGrid.home system property is not set

      • getCataloger

        public static ServiceDescriptor getCataloger(String policy,
                             String catalogerConfig)
                                      throws IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Cataloger using the Webster port created by this utility.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        catalogerConfig - The configuration file the Cataloger will use
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for the Cataloger using an anonymous port. The catalogerConfig file will be loaded from sorcer.home/lib
        Throws:
        IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not set

                          String lookupConfig)
                                   throws IOException
